author: sirtorito
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
![images(6).jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdgbR26UyygStk61Y1TJFFpWcHyoQCpkcE5NXiQgQgYHm/images(6).jpg)


The third stage of the World Cup (Russia-2018) has already started and here it is in the bloctrades country, bringing us the next phase. If you already participated in the first and second, what are you waiting for! and if you have not done anything to compete in this third phase [Enter Here](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)
___


Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
02 | France | vs | Belgium | 01
01 | Croatia| vs | England | 02

___

RULES
1 - The title of your post must be: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals

2 -In your post, you have to include a link to this announcement.

3 - Use the format included on this post to make your predictions so we can organize each entry.

4 - Use the tags "blocktradesworldcup" and the tag "mypicks"

5 - Resteem this post. We need everyone to see this post so no one stays behind.

6 - You can't edit your post after the first match of this stage start.

7 - Minimum Reputation to participate is 40. This is to avoid bots from joining and we will be checking that the winners ARE ACTIVE AND REAL STEEMIANS.

8 - You can submit your entry until July 10th 2018 at 20:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone. If you don´t know that time zone, check it here

Scoring
You have to include the score for these predictions. For each correct score you will get three (3) points. If you only get right who won but you didn´t get the correct score, you will be awarded one (1) point.

author: jasonshick
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
#### Well we are down to just 4 team left in the 2018 World Cup. Pretty amazing competition thus far. It has been great to see some surprise upsets along with teams that have not been this deep in the World Cup in a long long time (cough cough England)

<center>![russia 2018.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/russia%202018.png)</center>

I am just excited for the bet that took place between David Beckham and  Zlatan Ibrahimovic made. After the 2-0 Englas win I can wait to see the fish and chips at half time.

![dbbet.PNG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWuHm3fCaPZ7qRA5HSkjUfPWbifxw3jpsc9coPAvSRmRY/dbbet.PNG)

As for the World Cup itself. I have a huge Bitcoin pool with a few buddies and I have Belgium to take the whole thing so I will be rooting for the Black, Red and Yellow.

Thanks once again to @blocktrades, @anomadsoul & @acidyo for putting this huge contest on. Here are my selections for the semi-finals.

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | France | vs | Belgium | 1
1 | Croatia| vs | England | 2

I'm hoping Belgium will just stick it to France, but I think France has been the best team in the competition thus far. Anything can happen though, excited to see the final games of this years World Cup. Good luck to those still participating.

<center>![name gif.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmU7mxVjGB34LjbP7CX5XziGFpGGzuMdRG5Egko68BcF6Z/name%20gif.gif)</center>

author: mediahousent
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for Semi Finals
body:
![trophy-3472245__480.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmSj3S6EnKvNHNbryPhP71sSPchgSoAis4H7WrbY7Ym6yz/trophy-3472245__480.jpg)
[Source](https://pixabay.com/en/trophy-soccer-russia-football-3472245/)


I guess the opportunity to win some great prizes in the ongoing prediction organized by @anomadsoul & @acidyo and sponsored by @blocktrades is still much open to me. The long awaited World Cup Russia 2018 started few weeks ago and the group stage as well as the Round of 16 are over. 
It has been a great moment so far, hot, hilarious and sensational games from the team/nations.
Even it was an unbelievable moment for the defending champ to be evicted from the race so soon. **Guess nobody saw that coming!**

Some defeats are just too mysterious and unbelievable, but it is football. Anything can happen! 
Although, my nation was defeated but we had a better game so far in the history of World Cup. I'm looking forward to a better competition next four years, hopefully the squad would have gain much international experience.

**Before the World Cup started, I was privileged to join a football prediction organized by @anomadsoul and @acidyo on the blockchain for a whooping sum of 2,000 STEEM BACK DOLLARS. Isn't that fantastic? 
This prediction is sponsored by @blocktrades 
[Perhaps, you want dive into the pool like me. Catch your swimming trunks here](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)**

![steemflourish.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmYuwE59nBtKjnPUhd9x3XoLkVMeF4CTYYegAA5A6TYSjE)

And here are my predictions:

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
3 | France | vs | Belgium | 2
1 | Croatia| vs | England | 2

![steemflourish.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmYuwE59nBtKjnPUhd9x3XoLkVMeF4CTYYegAA5A6TYSjE)

# <center>The rules of the prediction are really simple</center>

• Write a post to select and give a certain score to the teams (if after 90mins of play, your scores are right, you will have a 3point and if your prediction is right for a team that won - that is just a point) 
Ensure your topic is - “The blocktrades World Cup|My selections for Semi Finals”

• [Ensure you resteem this official post](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)

• Use these tags - “blocktradesworldcup” and “mypicks”

• Only a verified account with at least 40 reputation can participate 

• Be sure with your selections before posting  cos you won't be able to edit it. Goodluck!

body:

Now we come to the Semi final stage of World Cup 2018. Lots of sweats and tears we seen from the players and fans out there. Too bad for those teams who were knocked out in the last 8 and good luck to these four teams. Here are my score the next matches.
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 3 | France | vs | Belgium | 2 1 | Croatia| vs | England | 2 ------- > RULES
> 1 - The title of your post must be: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals > 2 -In your post, you have to include a link to this announcement. > 3 - Use the format included on this post to make your predictions so we can organize each entry. > 4 - Use the tags "blocktradesworldcup" and the tag "mypicks" > 5 - Resteem this post. We need everyone to see this post so no one stays behind. > 6 - You can't edit your post after the first match of this stage start. > 7 - Minimum Reputation to participate is 40. This is to avoid bots from joining and we will be checking that the winners ARE ACTIVE AND REAL STEEMIANS. > 8 - You can submit your entry until July 10th 2018 at 20:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone. If you don´t know that time zone. 
---- > Scoring > You have to include the score for these predictions. For each correct score you will get three (3) points. If you only get right who won but you didn´t get the correct score, you will be awarded one (1) point.

author: my451r
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My Selections for The Semi Finals
body:
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png [Source](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/the-knockout-stage-is-on-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)
#
Russia World Cup 2018

The quarter-final match has ended and passed four national teams to the 2018 World Cup semifinals of Russia. The semi-finals this time consists of countries from continental Europe, the teams that qualify for the next round are France, Belgium, England, and Croatia. In the first match of this semifinal round, France will face Belgium. Both teams are the same who get rid of teams from South America in the quarter-finals. >Pertandingan babak perempat final telah berkahir dan meloloskan empat tim nasional ke babak semifinal Piala Dunia 2018 Rusia. Babak semifinal kali ini terdiri dari negara dari benua Eropa, tim yang lolos ke babak berikutnya adalah Perancis, Belgia, Inggris, dan Kroasia. Pada pertandingan pertama pada babak semifinal ini, Perancis akan berhadapan dengan Belgia. Kedua tim ini sama-sama yang menyingkirkan tim dari Amerika Selatan pada babak perempat final. The previous match, France beat Uruguay 2-0, Belgium next beat Brazil in the quarter-final match with a score of 2-1. >Pertadingan sebelumnya, perancis mengalahkan Uruguay dengan skor 2-0, selanjutnya Belgia berhasil mengalahkan Brasil pada pertandingan babak perempat final dengan skor 2-1. Meanwhile, England managed to win 2-0 over Sweden. Both goals England created through a header. In other matches, Croatia beat home side Russia, on penalties that ended with a 4-3 score. Croatia are the only team to make it to the next round in a row on penalties. > Sementara itu, Inggris berhasil menang 2-0 atas Swedia. Kedua gol Inggris tersebut tercipta melalui sundulan. Pada pertandingan lain, Kroasia mengalahkan tim tuan rumah, Rusia, melalui adu penalti yang berakhir dengan skor 4-3. Kroasia menjadi satu-satunya tim yang berhasil lolos ke babak selanjutnya secara beruntun melalui adu penalti. The semifinals will take place on July 11, 2018 where France will face Belgium. Further on the 12 July 2018 Croatia will face the English team. My prediction in the 2018 World Cup semi-finals is: >Babak semifinal akan berlangsung pada tanggal 11 Juli 2018 dimana Perancis akan berhadapan Belgia. Selanjutnya pada tangga 12 Juli 2018 Kroasia akan berhadapan tim Inggris. Prediksi saya pada babak semifinal piala dunia 2018 ini adalah :
![6m26ag2msd.png](https://img.esteem.ws/6m26ag2msd.png)

author: joel0101
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
Dear steemians,

Now we are already in the Semi-Finals of this year´s World Cup 2018. There were a lot of surprises and the quarter finals offered us some interesting matches. 3 out 4 matches were decided during the regular time and the last one in penalties.

Now there are solely European teams remaining and according to statistics, this is the first time than neither Brazil nor Germany are in the round of the last 4. One of both teams already made it until 2014 when the other did not. 

This point added to the win from South Korea on Germany. The elimination of Germany after round 1 and the first success in history for England after penalties are the highlights among other historical events during this tournament.

Even though I am not a fan of the french national team a.k.a. "les bleus" I also would like to point out the humble behaviour of 19 year old Kevin M´bappé who is the youngest player in World Cup history to score two goal in a game and who also decided to give his whole bonus to a charity organization. In a way, I makes me proud to see that there are players who are still close to reality despite the whole money they get. It is a huge contrast to what the french team was in 2010 in South Africa when players did not even climb-off of the bus to practice.

Now it is time to get to the prediction for the upcoming games. Although there would be so much things to say about this years World Cup, isn´t it?

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | France | vs | Belgium | 2
2 | Croatia| vs | England | 3

My prediction takes into account that I feel like the Belgian football team seems to be the best prepared to become World Champion. If my predictions get confirmed with the matches we would have an exciting final between Belgium and England who already played against each other in Game 3 of their group. The matchup with both teams at full strenght and giving more than 100% of their remaining strengths could be very interesting to watch. 

If you wisch to attend the contest you can find more information by using following link.

https://staging.busy.org/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool

Thank you to @blocktrades, @acidyo & @anomadsoul for the organization of this contest which is in my sight one the most complete on steemit.com

I would be keen reading your predictions and wish you a great day.

Kind regards
Yours
@joel0101

author: uwelang
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
## Final 4 Round - The New Champion will be from Europe
The World Cup of surprises is entering the last 4 matches of the tournament. Most big names are out and the final four teams are all from Europe which is surprising. Pretty sure France is seen now as the last survivor of the top favourites but will they become Champion? Obviously they have fantastic quality but will this be enough? Are they hot enough to become World Champion? I see a bigger passion and will to win in the eyes of the players for Belgium, England and Croatia - but I might be wrong. It is getting harder now to predict the upcoming matches. 

![fifa-3467669_960_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQ4Bji4NQWLnK5MB5kza9tGjwWJbjfGQRHyYeuG4hQExc/fifa-3467669_960_720.jpg)

Major thanks again to @blocktrades, @acidyo, and @anomadsoul for creating this fun contest for the **World Cup**.

Take part and check the original post for the Semi finals here: 
https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool


##  For the first time since 1930 no Brazil nor Germany  in the Semi finals 
An interesting side news is that for the first time since the tournament 88 years ago the Semi finals do not include one of the dominating teams from Brazil or Germany. Who will win? I said England and I will keep that but all other three teams are strong enough to succeed as well.

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
2 | France | vs | Belgium | 2
1 | Croatia| vs | England | 1

>To keep participating, you have to make a post picking each winner of the next 2 games. You have to include the score you think will happen on these 2 games in Regualar time (only the first 90 minutes):
France vs Belgium
Croatia vs England


Here are the rules from @worldcup-russia's post:

1 - The title of your post must be: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals

2 -In your post, you have to include a link to this announcement.

3 - Use the format included on this post to make your predictions so we can organize each entry.

4 - Use the tags "blocktradesworldcup" and the tag "mypicks"

5 - Resteem this post. We need everyone to see this post so no one stays behind.

6 - You can't edit your post after the first match of this stage start.

7 - Minimum Reputation to participate is 40. This is to avoid bots from joining and we will be checking that the winners ARE ACTIVE AND REAL STEEMIANS.

8 - You can submit your entry until July 10th 2018 at 20:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone. If you don´t know that time zone, check it [here](https://www.timeanddate.com/time/map/)

Scoring
You have to include the score for these predictions. For each correct score you will get three (3) points. If you only get right who won but you didn´t get the correct score, you will be awarded one (1) point.

You can submit your entry until July 10th 2018 at 20:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone.

# Password and Private Keys security

You all know that your Steem password is the access to all your STEEM, SBD, posting, transferring, everything... right?
So, please, follow these simple steps and keep yourself safe:

1. Apart from the initial setup of your account, NEVER use your password ANYWHERE, if stolen, it will give full control to your Steem account.
2. Backup your password and keep it somewhere safe. Use a password manager like Lastpass, print it on paper and put it in a safe (no kidding). If you forget your password, no one can help you out.
3. To login for creating content and curating, use your Private Posting Key
4. To make transfers and account operations, use your Private Active Key
5. To encrypt and decrypt memos, use your Private Memo Key

Again, head on to this post by @worldcup-russia SEMI FINALS STAGE - Submit your entry to keep competing for the 2,000 SBD prize pool to know the rules and mechanics on how to join and make a post about this contest.

To keep participating, you have to make a post picking each winner of the next 2 games. You have to include the score you think will happen on these 2 games in Regualar time (only the first 90 minutes):
France vs Belgium
Croatia vs England

Here are the rules from @worldcup-russia's post:

1 - The title of your post must be: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals

2 -In your post, you have to include a link to this announcement.

3 - Use the format included on this post to make your predictions so we can organize each entry.

4 - Use the tags "blocktradesworldcup" and the tag "mypicks"

5 - Resteem this post. We need everyone to see this post so no one stays behind.

6 - You can't edit your post after the first match of this stage start.
7 - Minimum Reputation to participate is 40. This is to avoid bots from joining and we will be checking that the winners ARE ACTIVE AND REAL STEEMIANS.

8 - You can submit your entry until July 10th 2018 at 20:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone. If you don´t know that time zone, check it here

Scoring
You have to include the score for these predictions. For each correct score you will get three (3) points. If you only get right who won but you didn´t get the correct score, you will be awarded one (1) point.

You can submit your entry until July 10th 2018 at 20:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone.

Unfortunately, this time around:

If you didn´t join for the group stage and knockout stage you CAN'T JOIN FOR THIS ROUND.

title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
## La etapa de cuartos de final terminó hace unos minutos y ya sabemos los partidos de la ronda de semifinales
![tickets.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTbSxcHFLSPhgQVT7iTcJ7b4rTAPHHbgYPsy77oPPRWPU)
Como ya sabes, a @blocktrades le encanta patrocinar este tipo de proyectos que atraen a la comunidad y @anomadsoul & @acidyo saben que a muchos Steemians les encanta este juego, así que decidimos organizar este enorme Football World Copa evento.
Estas son mis predicciones para las semifinales de la Copa Mundial @blocktrades.
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 02 | France | vs | Belgium | 01 01 | Croatia| vs | England | 02
###
REGLAS
1 - El título de tu publicación debe ser: @blocktrades World Cup | Mis selecciones para las semifinales 2 - En su publicación, debe incluir un enlace a este anuncio. 3 - Utiliza el formato incluido en esta publicación para hacer tus predicciones para que podamos organizar cada entrada. 4 - Usa las etiquetas "blocktradesworldcup" y la etiqueta "mypicks" 5 - Resteem esta publicación. Necesitamos que todos vean esta publicación para que nadie se quede atrás. 6 - No puedes editar tu publicación después del primer partido de este inicio de etapa. 7 - Reputación mínima para participar es 40. Esto es para evitar que los bots se unan y vamos a verificar que los ganadores SON ESTIMADOS ACTIVOS Y REALES. 8 - Puede enviar su entrada hasta el 10 de julio de 2018 a las 20:59 p.m., hora universal UTC + 3. Si no conoce esa zona horaria, [verifíquela aquí] (https://www.timeanddate.com/time/map/) ##
Puntuación
### Tienes que incluir el puntaje para estas predicciones. Por cada puntaje correcto obtendrás tres (3) puntos. Si solo acertaste quién ganó pero no obtuviste el puntaje correcto, obtendrás un (1) punto.
Si no te uniste a la etapa de grupos y etapa eliminatoria, NO PUEDES UNIRTE A ESTA RONDA. ¡Buena suerte a todos y que comiencen las predicciones!
## Puede enviar su entrada hasta el 10 de julio de 2018 a las 20:59 p.m., hora universal UTC + 3 zona horaria.

author: dumar022
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
#### I am sorry, I didn't take any photos from yesterday.
As always, my friends and I were at the local beach bar, drank tons of beer and watched our national team with a ​smile on our faces. 

#### We defeated he Russia! 
Yeah, it was a real drama, @moon32walker wore the same clothes as when we played with Denmark.
This morning, when I got up and the process of getting sober started, I read some news on the internet and found a lot of articles from English media that really pissed me off. I can't believe what they say about Croatia, those words are disturbing and very close to racism. On many UK portals,​ you can find many humiliating and insulting words about Croatia, mocking on our country​, size, language, and history.​ I always thought that the English people were stiffy, but this was something that I really didn't expect. So, I can't wait for the Wednesday, when we will send them home and end their dream about the World Cup. 


<center>![QmeRtJXVe8EZ8insMtNkRjMvfmkEeiKEPdM4R6WJ3Sg96j.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmeRtJXVe8EZ8insMtNkRjMvfmkEeiKEPdM4R6WJ3Sg96j)</center>
#### Now, let's get back to the @blocktrades World Cup!
The announcement​ is here, read it and you will find all the rules inside:
[SEMI FINALS STAGE - Submit your entry to keep competing for the 2,000 SBD prize pool](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)
___
#### And these are​ my​ picks:
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | France | vs | Belgium | 2
3 | Croatia| vs | England | 1
___
#### Thank you!!!

author: travelling-two
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
https://s5.postimg.cc/e3swi6l2v/football-3344911_960_720.png

**
[Source](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)
**

Hello Steemian Friends,

We're edging ever closer to the end of the World Cup! It's been unbelievable so far and even better if you're supporting one of the four teams left in the tournament. The FIFA World Cup 2018 in Russia has shown us more surprises in the Quarterfinal stages. The five time World Cup champions, Brazil and the favourites to win the cup after Germany and Spain were knocked out were knocked out themselves by the 'dark horses' Belgium. A national team with superstars all playing their trade in top European clubs. They showed that their 'golden generation' of footballers shouldn't be written off or excluded. The host nation, Russia, sadly fell at this stage by the agonizing 50/50 chance in a penalty shootout with Croatia. With Brazil out, this means it is an all European semifinals (last one was in 2006), with two previous World Cup winners (France and England) and two underestimated teams (Belgium and Croatia)! Will we see a new World Cup winner this year? Or will either France or England have the chance to battle it out in the Finals for a second trophy?

**@worldcup-russia**, **@blocktrades**, **@anomadsoul** & **@acidyo** have announced that **[the Semifinal stage submissions for their contest is live](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)** and everyone has around 2 days (a little more) to get their predictions in, so here we are getting ours!

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 2 | France | vs | Belgium | 1 1 | Croatia| vs | England | 2

It was not easy to predict a scoreline and it's more belief that both France and England can end up in the final rather than technical analysis of both semifinals. You cannot rule out a Belgium win against France or an upset by Croatia. At the end of the day, all four teams are strong and it boils down who can show up and step up on the day.

As always,

Stay Classy Steemians!

*Thank you for taking the time to read our post. If you really like our content, please follow us as we post regularly with different topics from Monday to Friday (with some exceptions at the weekends). How about your followers? Would they like this post? If so, please resteem it! Finally, if you are generous, please give us an Upvote! We thank you in advance! Lots of love / **@travelling-two***

author: pacokam8
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
The Quarter Finals stage finished a few minutes ago and we already know the matches for the round of Semi finals

As you already know, @blocktrades loves to sponsor this type of community engaging projects and @anomadsoul & @acidyo know a lot of Steemians love this game, so we decided to organize this enormous Football World Cup event.

We have more than 3,000 valid entries and the competition is starting to to get cooked, some people are already way too far for others to get close, but still, anything can happen on this cup as in the real world cup..

To keep participating, you have to make a post picking each winner of the next 2 games. You have to include the score you think will happen on these 2 games in Regualar time (only the first 90 minutes):

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 2 | France | vs | Belgium | 0 0 | Croatia| vs | England | 2

Scoring

You have to include the score for these predictions. For each correct score you will get three (3) points. If you only get right who won but you didn´t get the correct score, you will be awarded one (1) point.

If you didn´t join for the group stage and knockout stage you CAN'T JOIN FOR THIS ROUND.

Good luck everyone and let the predictions begin!

You can submit your entry until July 10th 2018 at 20:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone.

This is a @blocktrades sponsored contest, if you like what he is doing, vote for @blocktrades as witness here

This is an @acidyo & @anomadsoul organized contest, if you like what we are doing, vote for @ocd-witness as witness here

body:
![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png)
# [The @blocktrades World Cup | Mis selecciones para las semifinales](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool) Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- |3| France | vs | Belgium |2| |1| Croatia | vs | England |2|

REGLAS 1 - El título de tu publicación debe ser: The @blocktrades World Cup | Mis selecciones para las semifinales. 2 - En su publicación, debe incluir un enlace a este anuncio. 3 - Utiliza el formato incluido en esta publicación para hacer tus predicciones para que podamos organizar cada entrada. 4 - Usa las etiquetas "blocktradesworldcup" y la etiqueta "mypicks". 5 - Resteem esta publicación. Necesitamos que todos vean esta publicación para que nadie se quede atrás. 6 - No puedes editar tu publicación después del primer partido de este inicio de etapa. 7 - Reputación mínima para participar es 40. Esto es para evitar que los bots se unan y vamos a verificar que los ganadores SON ACTIVOS Y REALES. 8 - Puede enviar su entrada hasta el 10 de julio de 2018 a las 20:59 p.m., hora universal UTC + 3. Si no conoce esa zona horaria, [verifíquela aquí]( https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/russia/moscow) Debes incluir el puntaje para estas predicciones. Por cada puntaje correcto obtendrás tres (3) puntos. Si solo acertaste quién ganó pero no obtuviste el puntaje correcto, obtendrás un (1) punto. * Si no te uniste a la etapa de grupos y etapa eliminatoria, NO PUEDES UNIRTE A ESTA RONDA. Este es un concurso patrocinado por @blocktrades, si te gusta lo que está haciendo, vota por @blocktrades como [testigo.](https://steemit.com/~witnesses) Este es un concurso organizado por @acidyo y @anomadsoul, si te gusta lo que estamos haciendo, vota por @ocd-witnesstest como [testigo.](https://steemit.com/~witnesses)

author: syedumair
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My Selections for Semi Finals
body:
This is my entry to the @blocktrades World Cup contest organised by @blocktrades, @acidyo and @anomadsoul. ![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmeRtJXVe8EZ8insMtNkRjMvfmkEeiKEPdM4R6WJ3Sg96j) [Source](https://talksport.com/football/russia-world-cup-2018-fixtures-dates-kick-off-time-stadium-group-stage-match) We are well into the semi finals now and boy we have witnessed some thrilling matches on the road. I never expected that the 5 time World Champions Brazil will go down to Belgium and to be honest Russian team won my heart and it was really very unlucky for them not to qualify. France came out winners against Uruguay and again I was wrong in predicting that Uruguay are going to win. England won against Sweden 2-0 to book their spot in the semis against Croatia. Here is my prediction for the semi finals: Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 1 | France | vs | Belgium | 1 1 | Croatia| vs | England | 2 **Link to the [announcement post](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool).** Use smartsteem to sell and buy upvotes. ![steemit-border](https://img.esteem.ws/av4tt0mlsg.png)

author: exqueila
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
#### <center>  Welcome dear friends:</center>

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmc8J82mK9spey5WB6BSJcgBB8Sk7Q2HH4tUBJ95VBjFNc/image.png)

<center>Now we are in the quarterfin als, there are only four teams that must give everything on the court to achieve the longed for world cup. What is certain is that they are all European teams and in the finalists there are two teams that have had the opportunity to be World Champions like France and England, and two like Croatia and Bulgaria, want to have the opportunity for the first time to reach a dream to take home the cup of the world.</center>

<center>Only Days and we will know who will be the new champion of the world cup Russia 2018, these days we have been very entertained with the games and very focused on all the surprises that have generated these four finalists who have had to face strong rivals but are here to give us good football</center>

#### <center>These are my predictions:</center>
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
3 | France | vs | Belgium | 2
1 | Croatia| vs | England | 2

<center>I wish luck to the finalists and to win the one that plays the best football</center>

<center>I congratulate @blocktrades, @acidyo & @anomadsoul for the success they have had in this contest and that initiative that has been put to all of us who are part of this great family.</center>

author: davidad
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
![football-3374667_1280.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVJpQeZmtrsoByH1gAj5tKvGqTBqXgWrdHKYeetyjaQZL/football-3374667_1280.jpg)[Image Source: Pixabay, cco license, author: Gellinger](https://pixabay.com/en/football-world-championship-3374667/)

Hi Folks,
------
 hope everyone enjoyed their weekend, as many of us know who are football fans or country supporters who are folling up world cup we already know the matches for the round of Semi finals as just quarter finals results surprised many of us, here we go semi final clash.


This contest was been sponsored by @blocktrades who loves to sponsors or support this type of community engaging projects and @anomadsoul & @acidyo know a lot of Steemians love this game, so they to initiated this enormous Football World Cup event.

Note the following from @worldcup-russia post.
-------

To keep participating, you have to make a post picking each winner of the next 2 games. You have to include the score you think will happen on these 2 games in Regualar time (only the first 90 minutes):

***France vs Belgium***

***Croatia vs England***

*YOU HAVE TO USE THE NEXT TEMPLATE TO MAKE YOUR POST. REMEMBER THE TEAM NAMES MUST BE IN ENGLISH. WE RECCOMEND COPYING AND PASTING THE NEXT TABLE TO MAKE YOUR POST, JUST INCLUDE YOUR PREDICTION SCORES. THE SCORE MUST BE CONSIDERED WHEN THE 90 MINUTES END, SO THERE CAN BE TIES.*

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
- | France | vs | Belgium | -
- | Croatia| vs | England | -

Copy the table above and paste it in your steemit.com or busy.org post editor and the table will show like my prediction table, don't include my prediction scores tho lol! 


***This are my submit to this world cup semi finals games:***



Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
3 - 2 | France | vs | Belgium | 
1 - 2 | Croatia| vs | England | 

Below are the rules to follow when considering to submit your predictions
------

1 - The title of your post must be: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals

2 -In your post, you have to include a link to this announcement.

3 - Use the format included on this post to make your predictions so we can organize each entry.

4 - Use the tags "blocktradesworldcup" and the tag "mypicks"

5 - Resteem this post. We need everyone to see this post so no one stays behind.

6 - You can't edit your post after the first match of this stage start.

7 - Minimum Reputation to participate is 40. This is to avoid bots from joining and we will be checking that the winners ARE ACTIVE AND REAL STEEMIANS.

8 - You can submit your entry until July 10th 2018 at 20:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone. If you don´t know that time zone, check it here

Scoring
------
You have to include the score for these predictions. For each correct score you will get three (3) points. If you only get right who won but you didn´t get the correct score, you will be awarded one (1) point.

Very Important to note this: If you didn´t join for the group stage and knockout stage you CAN'T JOIN FOR THIS ROUND. Reason because there lot of submission from group stage, round of sixteen (16) and quarter finals, and now semi-finals do you see joining now there is no chance  you can. Read more from @worldcup-russia by [click here](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)

Good luck everyone and let the predictions begin!

You can submit your entry until July 10th 2018 at 20:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone.

Information sources: @worldcup-russia 

Thanks for stopping by on my post.
------

author: xabi
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
We are now into semifinals of 2018 Fifa World Cup and I have guessed correctly the score of three out four quarterfinals ([my previous post](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@xabi/the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-my-selections-for-the-quarter-finals)). I have lost my bet on second quarterfinals courtesy of some pretty poor football by Brazil.
![image.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmeLEuvgXwPJSVtxbMZDkKCRpbHakwnR3kzpzzY6C1myQp)
[ *(Source)*](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)
### I hate you Neymar. You are the most overrated/overhyped player in the history of soccer.
Despite of dominated possession and many chance Brazil failed to capitalize. The only goal, by Brazil was score by the substitute Renato Augusto. What other forwards (Gabriel  and Neymar) were doing??? Perhaps they took Belgium too light!!! Such a casual game play was not expected from five times world champions.
<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/t8IK0ZqfxNI" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

![sp12.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmQqAPCQtne9eF8or3kmRLnhfkJuGHuS4T2r9e1wsckxkz)

## Anyways, onto semi finals now.
This is my entry for semi final stage into  @blocktrades world cup. You can read the announcement post [here](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool).
So my picks for semi finals are...
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
3 | France | vs | Belgium | 2
1 | Croatia| vs | England | 2
### <center> Good luck France and England!!! </center>
![sp12.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmQqAPCQtne9eF8or3kmRLnhfkJuGHuS4T2r9e1wsckxkz)

So what are your picks and who is your favorite??? Do let me know in the comments section below and receive 50-100% of my upvote.
## <center> Gute Nacht!!! </center>

body:
Hola mis queridos lectores, Espero que estén bien, el dia de hoy realizo este post para seguir participando en la copa mundial de [@blocktrades](https://steemit.com/@blocktrades). ****
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png
[FUENTE](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)

The big eight has been completed for Russia 2018 world cup, now it's time to enter the semi-finals, where only 4 countries can advance to the semifinals. Countries that advance to the semifinals include France vs Belgium and Croatia vs. England. The infinite thanks for @blocktrades who have held this contest and thanks also for @acidyo & @anomadsoul who want to sponsor the world cup contest. *** ![844383_20171202091922.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRjwVjfpyZEDaEofEPvgKzLyEqeETnb9qWTVyzmhdXijC/844383_20171202091922.jpeg) ***
Source Picture
*** This is my choice for the World Cup semi-finals of Russia. Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 2 | France | vs | Belgium | 0 1 | Croatia| vs | England | 2 To see the original post, you can see here: To see the original post, you directly click here; semi Finals Stage - Submit Your Entry to Keep Competing for the 2,000 SBD Prize Pool. **Thanks** **@jmuda**

author: long888
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
https://img.fifa.com/image/upload/t_l3/s3hkgn5mjrpss30rnz5f.jpg
[Source](https://www.fifa.com/worldcup/news/saint-petersburg-s-story-so-far)

When most of all football enthusiasts across the globe were very excited about the start of the biggest sports event in the world, I am sure they are even more excited now that the competition is about to end.   

In a few hours the Semi Final bout will start with only France, Belgium, Croatia and England left.  I am pretty sure that people from these countries as well as their followers from around the world are now praying for their victory.

In my end, I don’t really have a personal preference or a particular team that I support aside from Saudi Arabia supposedly (I am loyal to them since I am here working in Saudi Arabia), but unfortunately they were not able to come this far and worst didn’t even won a single game.  Definitely not their time but maybe soon.

So if am to choose from among the 4 teams left I would go for France although it would still be perfectly fine with me if anyone of them will win in the final rounds.


## For the meantime here's my score prediction for the  Semi-Final Stage:
***
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
2 | France | vs | Belgium | 1
1 | Croatia| vs | England | 2
***

author: agbona
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
This has to be one of the most intreresting World Cup tournaments ever, this year's edition has seen footballing giants exit the competition at the group stage, and the best footballers getting knocked out during the round of 16. In summary, this year's competition has been nothing short of exciting and unpredictable. 

[The blocktrades](https://steemit.com/@blocktrades) sponsored World Cup has also being an interesting run, (to join the fun, click [here](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)) and here is my prediction for the next round of the event - The Semifinals. 


Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | France | vs | Belgium | 1
1 | Croatia| vs | England | 1

Big thanks to [blocktrades,](https://steemit.com/@blocktrades) [acidyo](https://steemit.com/@acidyo) and [anomadsoul](https://steemit.com/@anomadsoul) for organising this amazing competition, I can't wait to see how it all plays out in the end.

author: peterakpan
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
Well well well , the semi-finals is here already!!! Now who thought England would go this far with a relatively young inexperienced squad *that haven't played together before*. Is it sheer luck or determination? Well against Croatia we'll find out. 

France on the other side have taken my heart. Belgium undoubtedly are star studded, maybe they'd gone out in the round of 16 but a win over Brazil showed they meant business. 

Sofar so good this cup has been full of surprises and of course @blocktrades comes with gifts from the world cup. It's simple....  *predict and win*.



![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png)

So my love for France and England got a better side of me in this round but hey I can't miss two right?? 


Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
2 | France | vs | Belgium | 1
1 | Croatia| vs | England | 2

You could still take part by checking out the link below. 

https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool

Thanks to @blocktrades.

author: abh12345
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
It's been a long time coming, but England have reached the semi-final of the 2018 World Cup - and they deserve to be there!

[A link to the announcement](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)

<center>
![image.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmeLEuvgXwPJSVtxbMZDkKCRpbHakwnR3kzpzzY6C1myQp)
</center>

The quarter final results mean that we have 4 European countries in the semi-final of the World Cup for only the fifth time.  And one of the teams I fancied before the tournament are still in and looking strong.

![image.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/Qmd6GSQjbqo3gK96Aqy3JYEpRcmqGLMfs2LDeJvzZE38fq)

I was asked last night if I was old enough to remember England's semi-final against Germany.  I'll be 40 in December and replied with yes, and the 1986 quarter final against Argentina featuring the 'hand of god'.  Both those games left me and my brother in tears, football meant a lot to us back then!

3 decades later, I doubt there will be tears, but I'd be lying if I said don't mind England going out - I just hope the game is played in a fair and honest manner, the referee doesn't cock anything up, and the deserved winner progresses.

-----------------------

France v Belgium is the stand out tie, and even though my heart is siding with England, I think the winner of this game will lift the World Cup. Hazard and De Bruyne are great players, but they are up against Kante and Pogba and a strong, athletic French team.  I expect the game to be very close and cannot see either side keeping a clean sheet.

Potential match-winners - Mbappe (France), De Bruyne (Belgium)

Croatia v England is also likely to be tight, and I don't expect either team to dominate.  Both sides have had the majority of possession in their games prior to this one, and with the likes of Modric and Rakitić (of Real Madrid and Barcelona respectively), it's not difficult to see why Croatia have been in charge of the ball.

England have had great success from dead-ball situations, and even though the secret is out, I still think this will continue - no amount of training is going to stop these chances coming along.  The first goal against Sweden the other day was England's 8th set-piece goal, and looking at the Croatian defense, and how they have performed in the air, I'm hoping to see that statistic rise on Wednesday.

Potential match-winners - Modric (Croatia), Maguire (England)

### My predictions
###

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
2 | France | vs | Belgium | 2
1  | Croatia| vs | England | 2

### 
Both games are too close to call, and so I've gone for a score draw in the first, and chosen to side with my heart for the England game.  Luck, an error, a header from a free-kick, or just a top class goal will separate the teams.  

Fingers-crossed, and come on England!! ⚽

Cheers

Asher

author: themanualbot
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png)

The FIFA WorldCup Russia 2018 Quarter Finals matches concluded and we are heading into Semi-Finals where only 4 remaining teams competing to make it to the top. The @worldcup-russia posted the latest announcement about the [Semi-Finals Predictions](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool) for the 2 matches of FRANCE vs BELGIUM and CROATIA vs ENGLAND. The remaining teams were all European teams. It was an unexpected outcome for the two remaining Latin countries, Uraguay and Brazil for being defeated by France and Belgium respectively. I got 2 points only from the Quarter Final matches that put me down to the 10th place in the ranking. Hoping for best results this time!



These are my predictions for the Semi-Finals:

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
3 | France | vs | Belgium | 1
2 | Croatia| vs | England | 0

Goodluck with your predictions!

You can submit your entry until July 10th 2018 at 20:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone.

This is a @blocktrades sponsored contest!

*Thumbnail credited to @worldcup-russia*

![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png)

Until now I am not tooo bad in the score with 21 points after the group stage (I think number one had 31), 8 points during the first knock out stage and 7 points at the quarter finals. 

I didn't pick all the correct winners last round, but 2 times the right score. And of course France won as I said against Uruguay.

1	Brazil	vs	Belgium	2
0	Sweden	vs	England	2

## So, here we go again! The world cup goes on tomorrow and these are my predictions for this last 4.


Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
2 | France | vs | Belgium | 2
1 | Croatia| vs | England | 3

I think it is great that after so many years almost all the "big teams" are kicked out already. I would love to see the team of Belgium or Croatia on the podest. Anyways, neither of this 4 teams have won the world cup in forever (or at least a while), so that is already great news :)

If you also want to join this game or want to know what it's all about click [here](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool.)

Good luck everyone! - Especially to Belgium & Croatia as outsider ;)

And a huge thank you to @anomadsoul, @acidyo, and @blocktrades for providing this community with some much needed fun!

Greetings from Corfu, Greece!!

![36885982_10216936255144484_1115058739372621824_n.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmc4J4MngXKHFeMY5JeW8LQz8N6oitBovMN5XtiDG2kSd1/36885982_10216936255144484_1115058739372621824_n.jpg)

Cheers,
Liz

Following Part from [Original Post](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool):

**RULES**

----------

1 - The title of your post must be: The  [@blocktrades](https://steemit.com/@blocktrades)  World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals

2 -In your post, you have to include a link to this announcement.

3 - Use the format included on this post to make your predictions so we can organize each entry.

4 - Use the tags "blocktradesworldcup" and the tag "mypicks"

5 - Resteem this post. We need everyone to see this post so no one stays behind.

6 - You can't edit your post after the first match of this stage start.

7 - Minimum Reputation to participate is 40. This is to avoid bots from joining and we will be checking that the winners ARE ACTIVE AND REAL STEEMIANS.

8 - You can submit your entry until July 10th 2018 at 20:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone. If you don´t know that time zone,  [check it here](https://www.timeanddate.com/time/map/ "This link will take you away from steemit.com")

---

**Scoring**



You have to include the score for these predictions. For each correct score you will get three (3) points. If you only get right who won but you didn´t get the correct score, you will be awarded one (1) point.

----------

If you didn´t join for the group stage and knockout stage you CAN'T JOIN FOR THIS ROUND.

Good luck everyone and let the predictions begin!

----------

**You can submit your entry until July 10th 2018 at 20:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone.**

----------

This is a  [@blocktrades](https://steemit.com/@blocktrades)  sponsored contest, if you like what he is doing, vote for  [@blocktrades](https://steemit.com/@blocktrades)  as  [witness here](https://steemit.com/~witnesses)

This is an  [@acidyo](https://steemit.com/@acidyo)  &  [@anomadsoul](https://steemit.com/@anomadsoul)  organized contest, if you like what we are doing, vote for  [@ocd-witness](https://steemit.com/@ocd-witness)  as  [witness here](https://steemit.com/~witnesses)

author: lemmybe
title: The blocktrades World Cup|My selections for Semi Finals
body:
![image](https://img.esteem.ws/g1ew5zi8nx.jpg)
### And so the end approaches 
Yet, it gets interesting and does seem we ain't getting enough. The battle is now between the remaining four titans in football. Although, one being a debutant in this stage leaves some to believe it will be a walk in the park for them while some believe the walk just became tougher. 

My take is, absolutely nothing is impossible  and you could tell from what we've seen so far in this competition. The recent shocker was Belgium defeating Brazil. And it is definitely not by the popularity of players nor the expensive resources. It is always about preparation, hardwork, coordination and good team play. Well, who knows...
**Tomorrow shall decide**

But today i will do my own predictions and let's hope this flies amongst the entries already received.

### So...
As a continuation to my entries for the World Cup contest organized by @anomadsoul and @acidyo and sponsored by @blocktrades. These are my submissions for the next round.

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
2 | France | vs | Belgium | 1
1 | Croatia| vs | England | 1


**<center>Note: This is only for those that have participated in previous predictions</center>**
### <center>The rules</center> 

> Write a post to select and give a certain score to the teams (if after 90mins of play, your scores are right, you will have a 3point and if your prediction is right for a team that won - that is just a point)

> Ensure your topic is - “The blocktrades World Cup|My selections for Semi Finals ”

> Ensure you resteem this official post

> Use these tags - “blocktradesworldcup” and “mypicks”

> Only a verified account with at least 40 reputation can participate

> Be sure with your selections before posting cos you won't be able to edit it. Goodluck!

### <center>Scoring</center>
**<center>You have to include the score for these predictions. For each correct score you will get three (3) points. If you only get right who won but you didn´t get the correct score, you will be awarded one (1) point.</center>**

### I wish you all the good luck in this stage.

Picture from pixabay.com

author: dianita
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
#
Hello to all my beloved soccer fans
so much to wait and the World Cup is almost over, an incredible and wonderful world cup, to debate who has been better who will be the candidate to win the cup, it is uncertain this is the world of surprises but well deserved for the four selections that have given everything, they have put all their enthusiasm and have taken their good football, what beautiful what Russia 2018 gift us emotions and desepciones, the time came of the semi final, they play the whole for everything , they know that they are one step away from playing the final, and that they went through the group stage (opponents, fourth and now semi final) for one reason only to give their country joy and take the cup. will be recognized as the best in the world, will have that title for four years, where they will leave the name of their country well up, now we have to speculate and because I say this, because fuitbol is unpredictable, and a sample of it, is this world , to say that there was a correct prediction at the bottom of the letter is to fall for a lie, no doubt we have been surprised by results that we did not think would happen but here we are in the final stretch, 4 wonderful selections with different attributes, France a fair game and fast, Belgium with its scoring chart and its good soccer, England with its impeccable organization, croatia the magic, and the good tactics, my predictions I owe it to the performance of each selection, that if some of the two selections do not rule out that they arrive at penal this will be very dicifil and define it just by putting a result is quite complex, but here I leave it, enjoy what gives us football greetings.
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 2 | France | vs | Belgium | 1 0 | Croatia| vs | England | 2 ![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png)
@blocktrades post for the semi finals
We started this prediction from the group stage now to the semi(s).
Happy joining by clicking here.
This is a @blocktrades sponsored contest, supported by @acidyo & @anomadsoul
#
@dianita

<center>**RULES:**</center>

1 - The title of your post must be: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals

2 -In your post, you have to include a link to this announcement.

3 - Use the format included on this post to make your predictions so we can organize each entry.

4 - Use the tags "blocktradesworldcup" and the tag "mypicks"

5 - Resteem this post. We need everyone to see this post so no one stays behind.

6 - You can't edit your post after the first match of this stage start.

7 - Minimum Reputation to participate is 40. This is to avoid bots from joining and we will be checking that the winners ARE ACTIVE AND REAL STEEMIANS.

8 - You can submit your entry until July 10th 2018 at 20:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone.

title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
source

About #blocktradesworldcup

As you already know, @blocktrades loves to sponsor this type of community engaging projects and @anomadsoul & @acidyo know a lot of Steemians love this game, so we decided to organize this enormous Football World Cup event.
You can read the post here to join this; SEMI FINALS STAGE - Submit your entry to keep competing for the 2,000 SBD prize pool.

source

My Prediction

The perception of The Quarter final is unexpected. Many countries are championed previously swallowed his defeat. Then whether The Semi Final will also be the same fate? Let's experiment again. Based on the results of the match last quarter final, then this is my prediction for The Semi Final: Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 3 | France| vs | Belgium| 2 1 | Croatia | vs | England | 2

author: crisangel
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals.
body:
My dear readers, the fever for the soccer world cup Russia 2018 is still going on, the bad news is that we are only a few days away from knowing the new champion of this edition and therefore, the end of this majestic party. Who would believe that a few days ago began this cup and is just a few days to finish, time flies. This football world cup Russia 2018 has been very unpredictable with results that many did not expect, but what until now is very clear is that the champion will be a European team coming from the confederation of UEFA, because this instance of semi-finals only counts with European teams

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmc8J82mK9spey5WB6BSJcgBB8Sk7Q2HH4tUBJ95VBjFNc/image.png)
[Source.](https://talksport.com/football/373172/world-cup-2018-fixtures-results-games/)
Although we are in the final week where will the World Cup ended, we continue celebrating with emotion to the fullest and shouting a goal with a strong voice. A prediction contest will be organized for the next instance, I'm talking about the semifinals, where @blocktrades will be the sponsor and @ acidyo and @anomadsoul know that many Steemians love this game, so they decided to organize this great event.
![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVY3yz8j53LSTuNmC7mQhNcZcPmHCdjztAMcAneUve7bQ/image.png)
[Source.](https://prnt.sc/iu376a)
It is very easy to continue participating in this contest, you just have to make a publication selecting each winner of the next 2 games. You must include the score you think will happen in these 2 games and the score should be considered when the 90 minutes end, which will allow predictions in a draw.
Here I share my predictions for the quarterfinals.

Score
|
Team

vs

As a contest without rules is not a contest, the rules remain the same, here I share them so that you know them and start participating.
![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWWFh39BQYcb38iLS2c68hyLRHPMXcBhq6eFBnCZ7hcbf/image.png)
[Source.](https://prnt.sc/iu376a)

Rules:

1 - The title of your post must be: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals.

2 - In your publication, you must include a link to this announcement made by @worldcup-russia, you can see it here.

3 - Use the format included in the link above so we can organize each entry.

4 - Use the tags #blocktradesworldcup and the tag #mypicks.

5 - Resteem the publication of the announcement of this challenge, enter here to see it.

6 - You can't edit your post after the first match of this stage start.

7 - Minimum Reputation to participate is 40. This is to avoid bots from joining.

8 - You can submit your entry until July 6th 2018 at 16:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone. If you don´t know that time zone, check it here.

Scoring

You have to include the score for these predictions. For each correct score you will get three (3) points. If you only get right who won but you didn´t get the correct score, you will be awarded one (1) point.
Hello, if you just saw this and you did not join the group stage, either in the round of 16 or the quarterfinals, do not worry, there's good news for you, you can still join the semifinals stage, just keep in mind that other people have already joined from the beginning and will have an advantage over you.
This is a @blocktrades sponsored contest, if you like what he is doing, vote for @blocktrades as witness here.

This is an organized contest @acidyo & @anomadsoul, if you like what they are doing, vote for @ocd-witness as witness here.

https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/404872034452242433/453339855326412804/bitmoji-20180603104611.png?width=300&height=300

Do not miss the opportunity to join this wonderful party, such as the World Cup, and participate in this prestigious event. Remember that the Soccer World Cup is only celebrated once every 4 years, will you be left out? Score many goals with your predictions and be one of the possible winners.
[![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmWQRusLEXKiN9Mt8HYgUSpwc3hCVCELWNQxWcwB44mAAs/Gif.gif)](https://steemit.com/thealliance/@syndicates/the-new-framework-of-thealliance)

Posted from my blog with SteemPress : https://crisangel.000webhostapp.com/2018/07/the-blocktrades-world-cup-my-selections-for-the-quarter-finals-2

author: korexe
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi Finals
body:
The Quarter final of the world cup has is over. Favourites Brazil were eliminated by Belgium who seem to the in the following of their lives. France also beat Uruguay to book a semi final spot. England had their way and Croatia had to go into extra time against host nation Russia who have been an excellent side through the tournament.

With the result of the Croatia vs Russia game, it means Croatia has played more minutes in the competition than any other team standing. I hope this doesn't tell on the fitness of the players

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/pi4979oaew.jpg)

Well, the semi finals are hear, and I am making my entry for this stage of the tournament courtesy of @Blocktrades, @acidyo, @anomadsoul.

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
3 | France | vs | Belgium | 2
1 | Croatia| vs | England | 2


These are my predictions for the semi final. Anyone can also join in making predictions. Read original post [here](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)

>This is a @blocktrades sponsored contest, if you like what he is doing, vote for @blocktrades as witness.
This is an @acidyo & @anomadsoul organized contest, if you like what we are doing, vote for @ocd-witness as witness.

This is possibly the biggest competition on steemit to date with over 2500 participants so far. The winners will get 2,000 SBD shared between them. So, let the games begin!</center>

<center>![WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR5h248eo3vteRUjMGCoDVRa7rBjyBLeWKf59DfRKF8o/WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif)</center>

<center>Gif courtesy of @anomadsoul used with their permission. Thanks for the graphics 🙂
So without further ado here are my predicted scores.</center>

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
2 | France | vs | Belgium | 1
0 | Croatia| vs | England | 2

<center>https://steemitimages.com/DQmaiuGasc2vGC6wrf3Nu7Su5GTzNSx9UJGuApEhdjAZvzU/9.png</center>

I am one of the poetry/fiction mentors over at #promo-mentors, if you have any questions or need any guidance with either of these tags please don't hesitate to ask for me, @raj808.</center>

@sirwinchester, @knozaki2015, @kingscrown, @doitvoluntarily, @englishtchrivy, @ericvancewalton, @good-karma, @htooms, @jrcornel, @kevinwong, @opheliafu, @pfunk, @stellabelle, @papa-pepper, @sweetsssj, @thecryptofiend.

Colorchallenge, beachwednesday, bwphotocontest, memechallenge, retovenezuela, steemitphotochallenge, treetuesday, MonochromeMonday, SunThursday, LoveFriday, BeautifulSunday,
These are some of the challenges that you can participate, you will slowly get to know others

body:

body:
# "No hay lugar en el mundo en que un hombre pueda sentirse más contento que en un estadio de fútbol" ### Albert Camus
![world-cup-russia-2018-png-clip-art-5a1d4792b7fe38.4264519315118683067536.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRVy7aBuNdqsMHEcNVZKp7zdcXwxBibXTJfAvBgYhw5fm/world-cup-russia-2018-png-clip-art-5a1d4792b7fe38.4264519315118683067536.jpg) [Source](https://www.kisspng.com/png-world-cup-russia-2018-png-clip-art-9360/) #
Hola a todos! Un placer saludarles nuevamente. Mañana se inician las Semi Finales del Mundial Rusia 2018, con el enfrentamientos entre Francia vs Bélgica y Croacia vs Inglaterra, buscando 2 cupos para la Gran Final . Los organizadores del evento son @anomadosoul y @acidyo y el patrocinador es @blocktrades. Para participar dirígete al post original del concurso haciendo clic aquí [CLICK](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)
![separador steemitvzla.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZKRcR4aqH96zELf3SjrP5FrWiSiM9RyK3dbR5Lt9ycJC/separador%20steemitvzla.jpg)
Hello everyone! A pleasure to greet you again. Tomorrow the Semi Finals of the FIFA World Cup Russia 2018 begin, with the clashes between France vs Belgium and Croatia vs England, looking for 2 places for the Grand Final. The organizers of the event are @anomadosoul and @acidyo and the sponsor is @blocktrades. To participate, go to the original post of the contest by clicking here [CLICK >](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)
![barravzla.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRma5ScwrX8eLgYpoiW6f9Bn7pX3Q43F6hnPvJgro3m9b/barravzla.jpg)
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 2 | France | vs | Belgium | 1 0 | Croatia| vs | England | 1

# The @blocktrades World Cup: My selections for the Semi finals
Hi dear ones, this is my entry to the contest in the celebration of the football world cup Russia 2018, in its fourth part (Semi finals). Sponsored by @blocktrades and supported by friends @acidyo and @anomadsoul.
https://radio-corporacion.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/maxresdefault-1-678x381.jpg [Source](https://radio-corporacion.com/blog/archivos/23670/cancion-del-mundial-la-fifa-2018/)

It's optional, but I recommend it, since these guys do a good job of supporting the platform. Without further ado my selections here:

author: wilhb81
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
Time flying by so quickly… 时间迅速飞逝中……

In the past three weeks, I and my cat - Bibi already wrote over endless matches of recaps and highlights. Some of the matches were ended with lots of surprises and shocks. 在过去的三个星期，我与小白条已经写了无数场的足球赛解说与回顾。其中有些赛事真的是完全令人出乎预料！

![image.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmeLEuvgXwPJSVtxbMZDkKCRpbHakwnR3kzpzzY6C1myQp)

We still remember, the time when Japan beaten Columbia, South Korea won two goals against the top choice Germany, France knocked out Argentina and Uruguay out of the semi finals and much more! 我们俩还记得，当日本队击败哥伦比亚、韩国以2：0净胜种子队德国、法国先后把阿根廷与乌拉圭给淘汰出半决赛等。

Less than two days, the semi finals within France vs Belgium and Croatia vs England going to kick off. 少于两天，两场半决赛，分别是法国vs比利时 和 克罗地亚vs英格兰即将上演。

Before that, I would like to make my prediction for the semi finals: 在这之前，我想要为半决赛做个预测：

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | France | vs | Belgium | 2
2 | Croatia| vs | England | 1

<hr>

Kindly check this post to submit your selection: 请查阅此帖文以呈交你的选择：

https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool

Also, a big thank you to @blocktrades , @anomadsoul & @acidyo for spending time to update each and every participant's score. It’s not an easy task, but they’d completed the tedious task perfectly. 同时，万二分的感谢 @blockstrades , @anomadsoul & @acidyo 抽出宝贵的时间来更新每个参与者们的最新排行榜积分。这不是一个简单的任务，但是他们将这繁琐的任务顺利的完成！

author: mrshev
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
![wc_semis3.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZRHp2cYgghNcKfkj4cgyQEW92aWK4k87HHiUkRswUNtR/wc_semis3.jpg)
The world cup fever is upon us, as only 4 nations remain to vie for the greatest prize in their soccer careers.

**[The 2018 FIFA World Cup](https://www.fifa.com/worldcup/).**

![wc_semis2.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZHB15fxKytAYbvERC8oeBaqNYHAQx7k1JYkGy5eU3pjZ/wc_semis2.jpg)
Mark this date and time **10 July 2018 @ 6pm GMT**, as **France will take on Belgium** to open the first of 2 semi final matches [here](https://www.fifa.com/worldcup/matches/match/300331531/#match-h2h)
![wc_semis4.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdQQ88VuEnAd3weADb9C7VHsBf6Lxcet1RsHZx8oEybYo/wc_semis4.jpg)

The next semi final match on **11 July 2018 @ 6pm GMT** will pit **Croatia against England** [here](https://www.fifa.com/worldcup/matches/match/300331522/#match-h2h)
![wc_semis9.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmU3m6titBJe5e6h4jt6Va4BQpRPRgj5Je4L2b9kq7w8YH/wc_semis9.jpg)

**Which nation will be victorious and proceed to the 2018 FIFA World Cup Finals?**
![wc_semis5.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWBqTVZbouQ7WJEDuNVJjd1tFUqGj3A9RTYozC8CRpKBx/wc_semis5.jpg)
So lets get the prediction started. But first special mention and much thanks to @blocktrades, @acidyo, @worldcup-russia and @anomadsoul for the chance to win **2000 SBD**! Find the post and rules [here](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool).
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 1 | France | vs | Belgium | 1 1 | Croatia| vs | England | 1
![wc_semis6.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQrLZaEg3BfNWJA6AnzMTs7pekW31UPU8at3z8pCDxem6/wc_semis6.jpg)
![wc_semis8.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmeJKXjP7HcKuTF72enq9fac2LvGuZobnrGwXMrenSTGBV/wc_semis8.jpg)

author: rauzaljm
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
**Hello Steemian Fellow** ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/8vjeoiow9v.jpg) source
**After the quarter-finals are over, the 2018 World Cup will soon enter the semi-finals. Here is the full schedule of the match.** **The 2018 World Cup quarter-finals ended on Sunday (8/7/2018) early morning GMT. Croatia became the last team to qualify after winning a penalty shootout over Russian hosts.** **There are four teams ready to duel in the semifinals. They will fight two places in the top party.** ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/43vewxmsha.jpg) source : screenshoot in google
**France will face Belgium in their first semi-final match, held at Krestovsky Stadium, Saint Petersburg, on Wednesday (11/7/2018).** **In the second semi-final, Croatia will play England at Luzhniki Stadium, Moscow, Thursday (12/07/2018) pm dawn.** > **2018 World Cup semi-final schedule:** **Wednesday (11/7/2018) at 01.00 am** **France vs Belgium** **Thursday (12/07/2018) at 01.00 am** **Croatia vs England** **The semifinals will take place on July 11, 2018 where France will face Belgium. Further on the 12 July 2018 Croatia will face the English team. My prediction in the 2018 World Cup semi-finals is :** Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 2 | France | vs | Belgium | 1 1 | Croatia| vs | England | 2 > **This post is a contest organized by @anomadsoul & @acidyo sponsored by @blocktrades. ** **If friends want to participate in this contest; please click on the link below :** https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool

author: g10a
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
![quarter1.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmX7F8obJLX1PDGqhV6uegr2PE6eGHTxMiP9TVgvXYYEJ7)
[SOURCE](https://wallpapercave.com/w/wp2306108)
## Fingers cross! Woooh! Four teams left. In your opinion or base on the previous games these teams have completed, what team would step forward to the final? Hhmm if you are to ask me, well according to my crystal ball It’s either France or England and Belgium or Croatia. Woops sounds weird huh, did you read it right or I just wrote it ironically insane? It seems that there were no teams was unselected from my opinion haha. Anyway, I hate my crystal ball you know. Before the group stage was started, he told me SAUDI ARABIA will beat RUSSIA. I was a bit confused and ask him twice I even said to him that it’s Russia’s homeland and to show some respect, let them win in an opening match. >Although I am in favor of team Saudi Arabia since I am working here in KSA for more than 2 years now. Unfortunately, Russia defeated Saudi team during the opening match but I was hoping they will take the next match since they still have two more fights before going to the knockout stage. On the 20th of June 2018 Saudi team fought against Uruguay. Egypt was beaten by Uruguay with total statistics of 57% base on their performance which includes attacking, ball possession, pass accuracy 86%, defending the ball, disciplinary and etc you may check it [HERE]( https://www.fifa.com/worldcup/matches/match/300353632/#match-statistics). While Saudi team garnered 60% in total with a pass accuracy of 86% exactly the same with Uruguay but in total Saudi team is way better than this team as per the statistics recorded by the [FIFA world cup official site]( https://www.fifa.com/worldcup/) check it [HERE](https://www.fifa.com/worldcup/matches/match/300331503/#match-statistics). However, I selected Uruguay for the win against the Saudi team and I got the right choice oh yeah they’ve defeated Saudi team. To my Saudi friends be cool huh it’s just a game and I only want a slice of SBD from the total of 2,000SBD prize pool lol. During the knockout stage (Round 16), I was quite confident that Portugal will defeat Uruguay and they could make it up to the final also with Argentina as these teams own a very popular player Lionel Messi of Argentina and Cristiano Ronaldo of Portugal. Sadly, these teams did their best to get into the quarterfinals but they both lost and cut the rope towards the next fight.
**These was my selections with scores on the round 16 vs the actual result.**
![knocuout1.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTpMuj8zGYnT3CLwVEaD8A3ZBBWfsrZbWrwromiUBWrsm) #
VS
![round 16.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/Qmavb6v4XosTii8eJpJxurPo912t7uy1tbedgn2MK128Fn) In the quarterfinals, I did not ask my damn crystal ball again he’ll just ruin my predictions lol. I really believed France will beat Uruguay but I was just wrong about my score prediction I wrote 2-3 while the actual score was 0-2 but at least I guess the right team who will win in that match. In Brazil against Belgium yeah I perfectly predicted 1-2 scores in favor with Belgium. I feel so sorry to team Uruguay, Brazil Sweden and the home court team Russia. Team Russia almost got there in the semifinals they scored 2-2 against Croatia but Russia got 4 penalties while Croatia had 3 so technically Croatia won the match.
**My quarter finals selections vs the actual result.**
![knocuot.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmX1gewnrYAfHDMbc2XwMKB3ooftg4CnVgTk4kGWmNDZZP) #
VS
![quarter.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmUciNRXeSLu9kE81hHidEcFDEQk6h8kkGZuK4tVB4EaXe) What do you think, can England again bring the crown at this time? I hope they give chance to another team. I bet France for the champion but we still don't know yet so let's wait for tonight's match with France VS Belgium. So here's my semifinals prediction for tonight’s match France VS Belgium and tomorrow night’s match Croatia VS England. author: andrewade
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
![New Composition_2018-06-04 15-01-09.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmS8Ujy91xzDMjDtDvBbWaPCFbUKDMJyxQ9u94XvzJ77hE/New%20Composition_2018-06-04%2015-01-09.jpg)

It's another moment again at the 2018 world cup where it isn't just predictable with an easy mind. At this present stage, all the four teams could be also seen as the most hardworking/hottest teams currently in the world of football.

We past from the group stage to round of 16, from round of 16 to quarter final, and now we find ourselves left with only four teams in the semi final. Do you think it would be easy predicting these few matches? I really doubt so!

I know some individuals are already underrating some teams and picking their favorite teams to be at the final and lift the trophy. However, in the world of football surprising things are bond to happen, and no team should be underrated considering how far these four have gone.

Today, France will play Belgium and unarguably, the two teams are well picked favorites to lift the trophy considering the quality of squad they both possess. But sometimes football don't go by the name of players, a team with the right determination would defeat any other team at any given time.

I have no confident about picking a favorite team to win each of both matches, because I find it confusing considering different factors which all the four teams have got. So for this round, I'm mostly relying on luck.

However, I was able to get two outcomes plus the right scores for the last round. That was fair enough considering how tight the game has become. Now, I'm giving my picks for the semi final matches.

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
2 | France | vs | Belgium | 1
1 | Croatia| vs | England | 2

body:
![image](https://img.esteem.ws/lshn17ejhb.jpg)

Entering the last four, England will face an easy opponent. Because, they will meet Croatia in Luzhniki Stadium on July 11, 2018. 
Croatia qualified for the semi-finals after a 4-3 win over Russia in a penalty shootout at Fisht Olympic Stadium, July 7, 2018.

Duel Two teams were forced to continue to the tos-tosan round because the score 2-2 lasted up to 120 minutes. The success of these teams qualify for the semi-finals can not be separated from the impressive performance of a number of star players. author: the-alien
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
![Alt Text](https://khelnow.s3.amazonaws.com/news/cover_pic/medium/2690813745_0617392845.jpg) 

If you would've asked me in the beginning of this World Cup about my picks for the last four finalists, I'm pretty sure my predictions would've been way too far off.

Maybe I would've picked one or two from the current semi-finalists,  maybe. But there's no way in hell that I would've guessed all four of them correctly.

 I probably would've followed the bookies and the experts and ended up sticking with the usual suspects: Brazil, Germany, Spain...etc.

But that's the beauty of football, that you never really know.

And now we have some beautiful semi-finals ahead of us. Who is going through to the final? I'm pretty sure that at this stage whatever score I'm going to pick,  the result is going another way entirely. 

But still, it's always fun to play and I hope you can join us.

Without further ado, here are my picks for the semifinals stage of the [@blocktrades World Cup:](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
2| France | vs | Belgium | 1
1 | Croatia| vs | England | 2

For anyone who is just catching up, make sure to check this [post](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool) to participate in this cool steemit contest with 2000 SBD in prizes.

Many thanks to @blocktrades, @acidyo and @anomadsoul for this awesome challenge!

### Good luck everybody!

[*Image Source*](https://khelnow.com/news/article/fifa-world-cup-2018-semi-final-teams-attributes)

author: lordjames
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
The quarter finals is over and my dream team Brazil has been kicked out of the tournament. England has been lucky in most of their match so, I'll believe that their luck will still be with them till the finals. That conviction is why I'm pitching a one goal victory over Croatia. 
![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmTHfEBLYbmTaCbEvZXWoYEnrMATNTiQ8R7iastxe57a7r/football-3344911_960_720.png)
Belgium has been a formidable team throughout the tournament but I think they have reached their end in this match against France. But all the same, who ever wins the match between France and Belgium will likely be the team to lift the cup. Now for my prediction 


| Score | Team    | vs | Team    | Score | 
|-------|---------|----|---------|-------| 
| 2     | France  | vs | Belgium | 1     | 
| 0     | Croatia | vs | England | 1     |


To join in the contest, read about it here https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool

body:
## Hello Steemians!
#
<center>https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png</center>
#
I had another disappointing results from the Quarter-finals and I still love to participate in this **Blocktrades World Cup** mainly because I'm a football fan from a **Basketball Crazy Country** - Philippines. I happen to have this contest via @maverickinvictus and if  you wish to be redirected of the contest's post, feel free to smash it below.
#
### <center>[SEMI FINALS STAGE - Submit your entry to keep competing for the 2,000 SBD prize pool](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)</center>
#
## So here are my Predictions :
#
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
3 | France | vs | Belgium | 2
1 | Croatia| vs | England | 2
#
## But I am Feeling Eden Hazard's Prediction might be True
#
So yes, before the start of the group stage, I happen to see a post in Facebook about **Eden Hazard's** prediction. He mentioned that Belgium and England will face in the finals, a thing that never imagines by a lot of football fan/expert/professionals/analysts around the world. What do you think?
#
## Thank you!

author: alexicp
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Semi finals
body:
Hola comunidad, ¿cómo están?. En el post de hoy hago la entrega a la cuarta fase del concurso realizado por @anomadsoul, @acidyo y @blocktrades.
![image.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmeLEuvgXwPJSVtxbMZDkKCRpbHakwnR3kzpzzY6C1myQp) [Fuente](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/the-knockout-stage-is-on-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)

Mis predicciones para las semifinales son las siguientes. Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 2 | France | vs | Belgium | 2 1 | Croatia| vs | England | 2
Si quieres saber las reglas y las instrucciones para participar debes dirigirte a [este post.](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)
Carajo! Tengo que mencionar que esta predicción ha sido una de las más difíciles que he hecho y más por el partido de hoy, Francia vs Bélgica. Como saben todos, ambas selecciones están en un nivel super-alto y son las favoritas para ganar la copa del mundo.
Les voy a contar que inicialmente tenia pensado un 3 - 2 a favor de Francia pero me puse a mirar varias cosas que ha pasado en este mundial y en los anteriores y a ultimo minuto opté por el empate 2-2, ojala que funcione el cambio ejeje porque como quede el partido 3-2 caramba! me va doler en el alma :V
Disfruten sanamente de esta magnifica copa del mundo y si van a tomar, no conduzcan!!
